metadata.title: CVE-2022-48948 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: gadget: uvc: Prevent buffer overflow in setup handlerSetup function uvc_function_setup permits control transferrequests with up to 64 bytes of payload (UVC_MAX_REQUEST_SIZE),data stage handler for OUT transfer uses memcpy to copy req->actualbytes to uvc_event->data.data array of size 60. This may resultin an overflow of 4 bytes.
